member.name: ICONINFOEXA
member.summary: Contains information about an icon or a cursor. Extends . Used by .

member.name: ICONINFOEXA.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: ICONINFOEXA.fIcon
member.summary: Specifies whether this structure defines an icon or a cursor. A value of TRUE specifies an icon; FALSE specifies a cursor.

member.name: ICONINFOEXA.xHotspot
member.summary: The x-coordinate of a cursor's hot spot. If this structure defines an icon, the hot spot is always in the center of the icon, and this member is ignored.

member.name: ICONINFOEXA.yHotspot
member.summary: The y-coordinate of the cursor's hot spot. If this structure defines an icon, the hot spot is always in the center of the icon, and this member is ignored.

member.name: ICONINFOEXA.hbmMask
member.summary: A handle to the icon monochrome mask bitmap.

member.name: ICONINFOEXA.hbmColor
member.summary: A handle to the icon color bitmap.

summary.para: Resource identifier of the resource in szModName module. If the icon or cursor was loaded by name, then wResID is zero and szResName contains the resource name.
You can use (wResID) macro to convert resource identifier to a resource name type compatible with the resource-management functions.
Name of the module from which an icon or a cursor was loaded.
You can use function to convert it to the module handle compatible with the resource-management functions.

member.name: ICONINFOEXA.szResName
member.summary: Resource name of the resource in szModName module.
